column5: It's Time: I've heard good things, big things live down there... I'm Going to begin my education of Lake Erie smallies!  Thinking of launching somewhere between dunnville and port colborne.... and then just gonna work some tubes and try and find em?!  What do ya'll think? if you got something you wanna share, please do.  Cheers! Dan
Sounds like a good plan....best time to fish is when you have time...
